text: The filtered series will be different for each simulated outbreak pattern realization . Just as in Figure 4 with the radiograph series , we calculate the 0 . 025 , 0 . 5 ( median ) , and 0 . 975 quantiles of the filtered radiograph series on each day t , based on the model fit to the Akron ED series .
